result.title: The Policy Guide framework and features
result.description: This will comprise: key task 1.3 findings; proposed policy guide structure and format (including proposals for innovative ways to present information); key insights and questions of relevance for subsequent WPs; and clear plans in collaboration with WP8 for how stakeholder engagement will complement, develop and enhance the guide’s impact, and with WP2-7 for the structure and conceptual design of WP2-7 outputs.
